attributes.action: send young offenders into the understaffed armed forces,as opposed to overcrowed prisons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that some offenders would benefit from the discipline and rehabilitation of the armed forces,and they would also be giving something back into the community.this would ease staffing problems,also overcrowding in our prisons.the said offenders would also be moved away from their group of peers,making it less likely of a move back into crime.a kind of national service,if you will.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
